Example:

python MakeSignedAttributes.py attr.priv attr.cert 1:2:http://blabla.com/foo.xml 2:2:http://blabla.com/bar.xml

mp4encrypt --method MARLIN-IPMP-ACBC --key 1:000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f:0000000000000000 --property 1:SignedAttributes:  --property 1:ContentId:urn:marlin:organization:foo:1234 foo.mp4 foo.mln
